Passives.Name: Survivor
Passives.Text: While Bloodied, gain Evasive 1 at the start of your turn.

Passives.Name: Diffused Light
Passives.Text: Enemies attacking this from outside Range 3 gain 1 Weak at the end of their turn.

Passives.Name: Auto-mending
Passives.Text: While bloodied, regenerate {0} at the end of turn.

Actions.Name: Dark Surge
Actions.Text: Channel Dark. Radius 1. Deal {0} dark damage and gain {1} Barrier.

Passives.Name: Dark Blood
Passives.Text: When Bloodied for the first time, immediately perform Dark Surge.

Passives.Name: Shielding Pressence
Passives.Text: As long as not bloodied, allies within Radius 1 take 1 less damage and deal 1 more damage.

Actions.Name: Elemental spread
Actions.Text: Place 3 Hazards adjacent to each other within Range 5. They deal 1 damage of the character's element to adjacent enemies at the end of each turn.

Passives.Name: Recovery
Passives.Text: Regenerate {0} at the end of each turn.

Actions.Name: Elemental spread
Actions.Text: Place 3 Hazards adjacent to each other within Range 5. They deal 1 damage of the character's element to adjacent enemies at the end of each turn.

Actions.Name: Armored Blow
Actions.Text: Deal Damage equal to your Block.

Passives.Name: Bastion
Passives.Text: Only loses half Block at the start of turn.

Passives.Name: Invest in Yourself
Passives.Text: When attacking, spend 1 Money to deal {0} extra Damage. When blocking, spend 1 Money to gain {0} Barrier. When moving, spend 1 Money to move 1 more.

Passives.Name: Refusal to Die
Passives.Text: When Bloodied and no Money is remaining, start retreating.

Passives.Name: Performance Bonus
Passives.Text: When defeating an enemy, gain 1 Money.
